# showPhysicsShapes

**Type Property**

Display the physics shapes for any nodes with attached [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsBody] objects.

## Declaration

```swift
static var showPhysicsShapes: SCNDebugOptions { get }
```

## Debugging Physics

- **showPhysicsFields**: Display the regions affected by each [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsField] object in the scene.
